None.Name: Blood Share
None.Description: Activate to transfer 1000 own life points to a friendly unit in a 15m radius. Reusable every 5 seconds.

None.Name: Flesh Feast
None.Description: Gathers nearby corpses to regenerate 300 life points every 6 seconds.

Three.Name: Flesh Feast

Extra.en: Flesh Feast's effect persists until the corpses' former lifepoints have been consumed. Overlord can regenerate lifepoints up to a maximum of the former maximum lifepoints of the corpses he gathers.
